Question
========
  
Given is the following equation for a given linear mixed model: $E(y) = \alpha+s_{i}+\beta t$.

Which of the following descriptions belongs to this linear mixed model? 
Answerlist
----------
* The effect of Time is linear and random.
* The effect of Time is linear and fixed.
* The effect of Time is nonlinear and random.
* The effect of Time is nonlinear and fixed.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
